name: Marso #1 of 1: Day 4: Prosperity (A Bright Future)
description: “Let there be the sun, moon, and the stars to give light.” The fourth installment to the ‘Genesis Block’ collection by Marso showcases the idea of a bright future wherein the possibilities and probabilities are tangible and not far out of reach mirroring the hopes and dreams of every user who is part of any blockchain platform, may it be an investor, a developer, a researcher, etc.; you name it. Symbolized by a progressive and prosperous utopia, this piece communicates to the viewer that sense of a better tomorrow through the innovation and integration of the blockchain.
